content: >this textured blanket is an easy and quick knit using bernat baby blanket yarnspirations skill level easy materials -bernat® baby blanket 100 g/ 3 5 oz 78 m/ 86 yds - 03510 peachy 6 balls -size 8 mm u s 11 circular knitting needle 36 ins 90 cm long or size needed to obtain gauge no longer available in french or spanish
